medical_history.chief_complaint: Severe crampy infraumbilical pain evolved into bandlike suprapubic distribution.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began this morning, with severe crampy pain that evolved in distribution. Patient also experienced nausea with non-bloody, bilious emesis three times and diarrhea. Denies fever and chills.
medical_history.family_history: Denies family history of gastrointestinal disorders, grandfather with lung cancer and history of smoking, denies other cancer.
